{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21339v1", "title": "Note on elliptic equations on closed manifolds with singular
  nonlinearities", "summary": "We consider a general elliptic equation $$ -\Delta_g u+V(x)u=f(x,u)+g(x,u^2)u
$$ on a closed Riemannian manifold $(M, g)$ and utilize a recent variational
approach by Hebey, Pacard, Pollack to show the existence of a nontrivial
solution under general assumptions on nonlinear terms $f$ and $g$.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-30T05:58:33Z"}
